name.baseName: Gas purification ; Biomass pyrolysis gas ; Biomass ; Pyrolysis and gasification ; All sizes; NESPS2
燃气净化 ; 生物质热解气 ; 生物质 ; 热解气化 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management89，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management89，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所述燃气净化过程主要用于清洁生物质热解气，该气体源自生物质原料的热解和气化。该过程适用于行业内所有规模的操作。所概述的管道末端（EOP）管理技术结合了物理处理、好氧生物处理和理化处理，以解决废水中的各种污染物，如化学需氧量、石油相关废物、氨氮、苯酚和氰化物。EOP技术用于确保环境法规的合规性，并通过工业废水最小化对水生生态系统的影响。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码45,四级代码4520文件，在完整版文件中第2499页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phenolisPhysical treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management96，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标挥发酚的末端治理技术是物理处理法+好氧生物处理法+物理化学处理法，其效率为96，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水处理设施DCS年运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为挥发酚，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution cyanideisPhysical treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)

源文件中描述为为生物质热解气，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
